body: Add urls into cbtf* and openspeedshop* package files and update the release versions for the Krell products.   We had a problem with uninstalling our components that is seemingly fixed by having a url present in the spack file.   Also, we updated our release version, so that is reflected in the changes for each component.
title: Add urls into cbtf* and openspeedshop* package files and update the release versions for the Krell products
